name: Universal Design System (Web) | Preview
description:
Preview of Universal Design System (Web)


Universal Design System (Web) is a powerful tool for creating landing pages, websites and dashboards in Figma. Contains UI Kit (Web), Data Visualization, Icon Set.


FULL VERSION

https://123d.one/products/universal-design-system-web/


INCLUDE

UNIVERSAL UI KIT (WEB)

UNIVERSAL DATA VISUALIZATION

UNIVERSAL ICON SET


INSIDE

  • 350+ variants of 15 Web UI Kit components
  • 100+ variants of 14 Data Visualization components
  • 1896 high-quality vector icons (632 icons x 3 styles)
  • 16 pre-made Templates (Desktop and Mobile)
  • 92+ pre-made Blocks (Desktop and Mobile)
  • Getting Started (Guide)
  • Styleguide


PRODUCT FEATURES

  • All shapes are vector based
  • Well organized library
  • Easy to change an Instance (Support Figma's Variants)
  • Easy to change colors


PLEASE NOTE

Basic knowledge of Figma is required.


CONTACT AND SUPPORT

Feel free to send me your feedback about the product at support@123d.one


FOLLOW
